title: O MOST HOLY ONE / O SANCTISSIMA

sections.title: Verse 1
content: O most holy one, O most lowly one, Loving Virgin, Maria!
Mother, Maid of fairest love, Lady, Queen of all above,

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Virgin ever fair. Mother, hear our prayer, Look upon us, Maria!
Bring to us your treasure, Grace beyond all measure;

sections.title: Verse 3
content: O sanctissima, O piissima, Dulcis Virgo Maria!

sections.title: Verse 4
content: Virgo, réspice; Mater, ádspice. Audi nos, O Maria!

sections.title: Verse 5
content: O most holy one, O sanctuary,

sections.title: Verse 6
content: In your womb the Word was made flesh,

sections.title: Chorus
content: Mother of Christ, pray for us,
That we may walk in truth and love.
